programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: To avoid self-harm, an intoxicated man is handcuffed to a booking bench. After fighting at a bar, a combative prisoner is arrested. Also, an unmarried couple squabbles during the booking process.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: To avoid self-harm, an intoxicated man is handcuffed to a booking bench. After fighting at a bar, a combative prisoner is arrested. Also, an unmarried couple squabbles during the booking process.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A media circus surrounds OJ Simpson as he is placed in jail for violating his bail agreement. During a body search, a man is tased and pepper-sprayed. A parole violation calls for all hands-on deck.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man attempts to eat marijuana in jail. The Special Detention Unit investigates forbidden letters hidden amongst inmates. A bloody, vicious brawl escalates between an imprisoned duo.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man attacks a medical officer and officers rush to intervene. After destroying a tree and unleashing pigeons, a woman is arrested. Unease is caused by a man’s menacing glare during his booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers struggle with an angry man after he kicks out a patrol car window. A relationship ends when a woman takes a bite out of her boyfriend. An upset wife stabs her husband and he ends up in handcuffs. A woman is happy to celebrate her birthday by going to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is placed into a restraint chair during intake. Punches are thrown and questions are asked after a fight occurs. After dodging a bar tab, a woman is also accused of spiting and biting.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers transfer an over caffeinated suspect to isolation so he can unwind. A man arrested for DUI while doing donuts in a mall parking lot asserts he was robbed. A jaywalking Utah man claims someone hit him on the head. A disgruntled detainee lands a sucker punch on a fellow inmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Uncooperative and agitated, a man complains officers are violating his rights. A “443” call is issued, and a deputy desperately needs help. Outside the cell block, there’s knockouts and bloody noses.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A testy man is sent to the isolation cell to "cool off." A teary-eyed young man maintains his innocence. An inmate may have ingested contraband to avoid possession charges.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers fear a man may attempt to hang himself and decide to intervene. A heavily injured man ends up in jail after taking cocaine and acid. Irascibility shadows a man with low blood sugar.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Angry over her arrest, a woman becomes combative with officers. Busted once again for drugs, a smart young woman knows she is making dumb choices but can’t stop using. A man eluding the police swipes food from his workplace before landing in jail. Officers get a laugh from an arrested panhandler who wants to buy a permit for panhandling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A code red call blares after a fight occurs in the jail’s dorms. Accused of trespassing, a woman removes her clothes from her holding cell. A man is brought into detox after slamming against a cop car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A vice unit interrogates several individuals accused of sex crimes. Suicidal threats provoke a high-stakes situation within cell walls. Unable to raise bail, a woman is incarcerated for several days.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A media circus surrounds OJ Simpson as he is placed in jail for violating his bail agreement. During a body search, a man is tased and pepper-sprayed. A parole violation calls for all hands-on deck.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After totaling his Corvette, a man is arrested for drunk driving. Complex personality issues are unveiled while an inmate is interrogated. A man is placed in a mask after spraying saliva far and wide.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is placed in isolation after disparaging other inmates. Alarms blare while a fight erupts in the shower room among inmates. A man booked into jail is revealed to have a 20-year arrest record.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: The night of the Mayweather-Pacquiao fight a woman pummels a nightclub security guard for an unusual reason. A man who claims to have served in the military confronts a Lieutenant and threatens fellow detainees in the holding cell. A “Pac-man” fan has a spat with his Mayweather-backing wife.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After cutting her head, a woman bites and kicks deputies. To investigate potential hidden meanings, a man’s tattoos are examined. A confused man is found with illegal mushrooms at a bus stop.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A dominatrix is arrested for playing rough. A father is accused of assaulting his daughter's boyfriend, and an inmate's negative attitude leads to trouble.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: By proclaiming that he is a Gulf War Veteran, a man states he should be imprisoned. A corporal investigates a “prisoner on prisoner assault.” An Officer’s last shift is filled with fireworks.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman comes clean to having drugs hidden where they can’t be seen. An inmate’s exotic makeup is cleverly created with candy and toothpaste. A couple is surprised to find that holding someone against their will is a felony. Doing the right thing turns into an extended stay for a woman with warrants.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies deal with chaos after volatile inmates begin fighting. Accusations of deceit plague a booking as a woman is arrested for drunk driving. Prisoners are restrained after causing a commotion.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate swallows a stash of drugs and then comes down with a case of the munchies. A 72-year-old offers an unusual excuse for dealing drugs to teens at a mall, and a woman charged with assaulting a landlord fakes being sick to get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Chaos surrounds a routine medical screening of an inmate. In the prison phone center, a smoking pipe is discovered and a mystery ensues. A pregnant woman is investigated over potential sex crimes.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in women's lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After refusing a breathalyzer test, an irate man bangs his head against plexiglass. A man transforms into a “cell warrior” within his holding pen. Soon to be released, an inmate considers the future.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT officers break up an altercation between two inmates. In Portland, OR a belligerent man questions the authorities. In Sarasota, FL a man is busted for DUI. In Las Vegas, NV a woman is taken into custody for battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A violent ruckus ensues after a man is placed in jail. Secret prison communication methods are explored and examined. Later, deputies cautiously extract a disruptive man while his wife is held nearby.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL officers place a hostile former Marine in isolation. In Portland, OR officers take a man into custody for joyriding in a stolen car. In Las Vegas, NV a jailed man is more concerned about the condition of his car rather than the people involved in the accident that was hospitalized.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested during a dangerous drug deal struggles to face jail time. Tempers flare when a man makes threats against the arresting officers. Marijuana falls out of a man’s pockets during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers find hidden drugs on a burglary suspect during a pat down that leads to a tense confrontation. A beer sets off a fight between a mom and her daughter causing one family member to end up in jail. A rare event takes place in the county jail - a woman arrested for a warrant is in a good mood. Punching a pit bull while drunk lands in man in jail where he comes face to face with a childhood hero.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: We follow the men and women of LVMPD as they do their best to tame the New Year's Eve festivities up and down the Las Vegas Strip.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man under the influence states money will buy his freedom after threatening police with a gun. Individuals arrested for possession blame each other. A man arrested for drunk driving becomes unruly.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate interrupts the booking process. A couple is brought in after signs of a domestic dispute but claim they were being intimate, and a jailed woman shares some of her Webcam exploits.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two men are found fighting on security cameras. Meanwhile, an impromptu tattoo jail parlor is discovered and shut down. Later, a Russian man and his mysterious friend are excited to be in a U.S. jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After being arrested for domestic violence, a man is placed in restraints. An intoxicated man picks a fight with inmates over their hometown. A woman is arrested for assaulting theater guards.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cell brawl escalates quickly. After being arrested on her wedding night, a woman has deep regrets and serious reflection. Officers free a man from his own noose and place him on a vigilant watch.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a combative inmate provokes the use of pepper spray. In Sarasota, FL a drunk woman is uncooperative during processing. In Spokane, WA a man attempts to flip off the camera while taking his mug-shot.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman fights arrest resulting in a trip to the isolation chamber. One inmate calls 911 within jail walls causing confusion. Later, officers run to the rescue when a man passes out.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an upset inmate damages the door on a patrol car. In Portland, OR a man over-estimates the legal consequences of his actions. In Tacoma, WA a couple charged with domestic violence denies getting physical even though there’s blood in the woman’s hair.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In his holding cell, a man fights officers after taking Xanax. An officer discovers a suspect may be facing criminal charges for his son. K-9 units are needed during a search for improvised weapons.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an intoxicated man is strapped to a restraining chair. In Portland, OR a seemingly gracious man is arrested for assault. In Spokane, WA a homeless man is brought in for assault. In Salt Lake City, UT a frequent visitor is brought in for threating the security staff at a local bar with a firearm.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Three inmates start brawling inside the drunk tank. One man must wear a mask so that officers can avoid his rain of spit. A young woman fails to take jail seriously and behaves provocatively.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate goes on a rampage when he suspects police of losing his money. Officers have a tough time with a drunk man. An alleged prostitute is stabbed. A drunk trapeze artist takes a drive on his moped.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers conduct a strip search after an inmate is accused of carrying contraband. A repeat offender dances for deputies and fellow inmates. High on meth, a man acts erratically during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man learns it’s never a good idea to light up a joint next to an active crime scene. An officer encourages a young drug addicted couple to seek treatment. Luck runs out for a tutu-wearing prostitute, and officers pick up an at-risk kid for their 93rd time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: One man booked for intoxication is placed in a sobering cell for being uncooperative. An aggrieved woman claims Animal Control took her “baby.” A man tells officers he is a “child of God” and actor.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After refusing a breathalyzer test, an irate man bangs his head against plexiglass. A man transforms into a “cell warrior” within his holding pen. Soon to be released, an inmate considers the future.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Code Blue alarms sound as inmates start fighting inside the men’s jail. An irate man with a huge beard refuses to remove bands inside his facial hair. A man with deep stab wounds stumbles into jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman finds herself in jail after telling police she was frightened by a monkey mask. An intoxicate man feels an officer is very special. During a search, an officer finds contraband in a pack of cigarettes that has big consequences to an inmate. A young man says his mom tried to pepper spray him over his brother’s drug use while officers discover the truth to his arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A prisoner refuses to exit his cell prompting an elaborate extraction. A man begins singing in response to his arrest. During a severe alcohol withdrawal, an inmate repeatedly escapes his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is charged with possession of a controlled substance. A woman denies assaulting her husband, and two aggressive cousins threaten police and end up in isolation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate is subdued for refusing to follow commands. A woman accused of running out on a dinner bill has her jewelry sawed off in jail. After issuing criminal terrorist threats, a man is jailed.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Tequila is to blame when a man's behavior gets him locked up. A woman tries to sell drugs online. A detainee in holding for a DUI is of the opinion that he’s been jailed for driving too slow.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A brawl breaks out between inmates during a routine jail breakfast. An inmate alters their uniform in provocative and outlandish ways. Concerns abound as one-man issues violent threats at deputies.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV an intoxicated man is placed in isolation after exhibiting combative behavior. In Portland, OR a man wearing a red dress is brought in for trespassing and tells officers that he is in the FBI. In Reno, NV two young men are set straight after stealing a car.
